int  aLoadValue 
)

Function that creates test interference “instance” and starts the interference process.

Parameters:
aType type of interference
aLoadValue value of load - percent for cpu, megabytes for memory, ignored for ioload
Returns:
pointer to interference struct.
Parameters:
aLoadValue  Function that creates test interference “instance” and starts the interference process, which will contiuously sleep and resume for given time periods
Parameters:
aType type of interference
aIdleTime time for which process will be sleeping during cycle
aBusyTime time for which interference will be active
aLoadValue value of load - percent for cpu, megabytes for memory, ignored for ioload
Returns:
pointer to interference struct.

Stops the interference and destroys interference struct.

Parameters:
